author: Reuters
title: China lifts Wuhan lockdown after 76 days
description: About 55,000 people are expected to leave the city, where the pandemic began, on the first day
content: After 76 days in lockdown, the Chinese city at the heart of the global pandemic reopened on Wednesday, and tens of thousands immediately hopped on trains and planes to leave. Elsewhere, the economic, political and psychological toll of fighting the virus grew… [+2353 chars]
